晸字的基本解释

晸
zhěng
日出。

晸字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhěng］
［《集韻》知領切，上静，知。］
(1)日出貌。
(2)用于人名。唐有曹全晸；宋有郝晸；元有刘晸。

晸字的康熙字典解释

【辰集上】【日字部】　晸； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页497第12
【集韻】知領切，貞上聲。【玉篇】日初出貌。

晸字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
晸字的起名意思

日出貌，用于人名。

晸
Basic explanation of words
晸
zhěng
sunrise.
晸
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhěng］
["Jiyun" Zhilingqi, Shangjing, Zhi. ]
(1) Sunrise appearance.
(2) Used for names. There is Cao Quanlu in the Tang Dynasty; Hao Lu in the Song Dynasty; and Liu Lu in the Yuan Dynasty.
晸
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji 1] [Japanese Character Department] 　晸; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 497-12
[Ji Yun] Zhi Lingqie, Zhen Shengsheng. [Jade articles] Appearance at the beginning of the day.
